lead_paragraph: Anastasia Lin, a Canadian who was barred from the 2015 Miss World competition in China, has been ordered not to speak publicly during this year’s finals in Maryland.

headline.print_headline: Beauty Pageant Restricts Contestant at U.S. Event
headline.main: Pageant Silences Beauty Queen, a Critic of China, at U.S. Contest

snippet: Anastasia Lin, a Canadian who was barred from the 2015 Miss World competition in China, has been ordered not to speak publicly during this year’s finals in Maryland....
abstract: Canadian beauty queen and social activist Anastasia Lin, who was blocked by China from attending 2015 Miss World pageant there, is forbidden by contest's British organizers from speaking to press during 2016 contest in Washington, DC; has been vocal critic of human rights abuses in China, where many of pageant's sponsors are based.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
